class evaluator_classification.Evaluator[source]¶

Bases: object

evaluate(network, pre_block=[], is_bestNN=False, update_pre_weight=False)[source]¶

Method for evaluate the given network.

Parameters

  • network – NetworkItem()

  • pre_block – The pre-block structure, every block has two parts ‘graph_part’ and ‘cell_list’ of this block.

  • is_bestNN – Symbol for indicating whether the evaluating network is the best network of this round.

  • update_pre_weight – Symbol for indicating whether to update previous blocks’ weight.

Returns

accuracy, float.
